items.text: length on middle stump, glanced into the leg side off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: offcutter across the corridor on a length and he lets it go
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: inside edge onto thigh guard as he looks to close the face on this length ball which is slanting across him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off. Swish and miss. His feet aren't moving too well at the moment
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: nice looking shot. Gets off the ground and forecefully whips one to deep square, across the angle
length on middle stump, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, defended to point with an open face
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: full toss outside off, driven hard, but straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, backs away and punches one-handed to long-off
short of a length on middle, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot

drilled over the bowler. Geez. That's barely gone ten feet up from where I'm seeing it, but it's cleared the fence. Hossain lobs one up full and Gayle gets is front leg out of the way to crash this flat
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, SIX runs

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked through square leg
length on middle stump, deep in the crease to defend down the pitch
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it straight to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: slower ball on a length at middle stump, rips in at him but he manages to get an inside edge on this for the single that brings up his fifty
short of a length outside off, neatly punched to sweeper cover
slower ball blocked into the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, closes the face and taps this into the leg side off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: under-edges the cut and it rolls back down the pitch. Short and wide from the bowler but it didn't rise
short of a length wide outside off and a nicely timed punch. But once again straight to the fielder at extra
length on middle stump, punched to midiwicket
short outside off, sliced into the point area with an open face
nice. Deft. Short ball sliding down leg from around the wicket and he deliberately taps this on its head past short fine as he swivels
short of a length on the stumps, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
items.postText: And that's all from me. Sreshth will see you through.
